MemeDef.label: True Same-Sex Love
MemeDef.description: This ideology believes that true love can only exist between equals of the same gender. Heterosexual unions are merely for procreation, while same-sex unions are a resonance of the soul.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> [deity0_name] split the original being into two halves of the same kind, so they might find perfect understanding.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> The believers saw that those who loved their own kind walked in the light of [deity0_name].
intro(tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> In the early days, the people realized that spiritual connection was strongest between those who shared the same essence.
conflict(tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> The [foeLeader] tried to force unnatural unions upon the [memberNamePlural], forbidding their true loves.
victory(tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> [founderName] defeated the oppressors and established a sanctuary where love knows no bound, provided it is pure.
setup(tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> Our founders built a community dedicated to the celebration of same-sex unions.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> They lived in harmony, proving that love between equals is the strongest bond.
lesson(tag=meme_HomoMeme_TrueSameLove) -> perfection is found in the reflection of oneself
